backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing songs, personal songs, and user profiles with access control and upload operations for admins and users.
feature_evidence.json: Collection of feature evidence entries linking layout and mobile sidebar requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose and recent updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme color tokens for light/dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes, layout, theme provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component gating admin routes with login checks, admin checks, and user-friendly fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Modal dialog for creating or editing songs with file uploads, metadata inputs, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/branding/Fourlea: Renders Fourleaf brand logo in full, compact, or icon variants.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Displays a song row with play controls, metadata, cover art, and download button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Download button handling auth, subscription checks, and audio file download with UI states.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Dialog for uploading public songs with metadata fields, file inputs, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Scrollable horizontal row with snap behavior for child elements.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: Clickable song card with cover art, play button, and transition context setup.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: Section wrapper showing a title, optional icon, show-all button, and content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with sidebars, header login button, content outlet, audio player, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: Search bar with home navigation, query input, and a browse menu with accessibility and UI sound handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: Renders a simple tab bar to switch between home browsing categories.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Sidebar providing navigation links, admin access, branding, and UI sound settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Displays current song details or a placeholder when nothing is playing.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: Dialog for uploading personal songs with metadata, authentication checks, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: Audio player bar handling playback, streaming sources, timing, volume, and queue controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users to set up their profile with name and subscription status.
frontend/src/components/settings/UISound: Settings panel to enable UI sounds and adjust their volume.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Provides a Zustand-powered audio queue with playback controls, navigation, metadata tracking, and UI transition context.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Simple Zustand store for managing the header search query.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Zustand store for tracking the active home tab and scroll reset triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs, profiles, and user-specific data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISounds.ts: Provides a hook for playing UI click sounds using stored sound settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISoundSettings.ts: Persistent Zustand store for toggling UI sound effects and volume.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, utilities, and animation rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for listing, creating, editing, and deleting catalog songs with loading states and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Public library page showing all songs with search, browsing tabs, recommendations, and playback integration.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: User’s personal library with authentication gating, song filtering, playback, uploading, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/NowPlayingPage.tsx: Full-screen now-playing interface showing artwork, song info, progress, and playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerLayoutPage.tsx: Layout page combining sidebar navigation, hero section, simple playback controls, and mock track list display.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: React page that renders three pricing plan cards with features, badges, and a free‑trial button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing sidebar layout requirements, mobile behavior, design constraints, and known issues.
